00007 #pragma once
00008 
00009 #include <functional>
00010 #include <utility>
00011 #include <type_traits>
00012 #include "lsf/basic/macro.hpp"
00013 #include "lsf/basic/noncopyable.hpp"
00014 
00015 namespace lsf {
00016 namespace basic {
00017 namespace detail {
00018 
00020 // ScopeExit
00021 template<typename FuncType>
00022 class ScopeExit : public lsf::basic::NonCopyable {
00023 public:
00024     // constructor, use std::forward for perfect forwarding
00025     inline explicit ScopeExit(FuncType&& func) : _func(std::move(func)) {}
00026     inline explicit ScopeExit(FuncType const& func) : _func(func) {}
00027 
00028     // move constructor, move all content
00029     inline ScopeExit(ScopeExit&& rhs) : _func(std::move(rhs._func)) {}
00030 
00031     // destructor, if not dismiss then call func
00032     inline ~ScopeExit() { if (!_is_dismiss) _func(); }
00033 
00034     inline void Dismiss() { _is_dismiss = true; }
00035 
00036 private:
00037     FuncType _func;
00038     bool _is_dismiss = false;
00039 };
00040 
00042 // ScopeExitCreator
00043 class ScopeExitCreator {
00044 public:
00045     template<typename FuncType>
00046     inline detail::ScopeExit<typename std::decay<FuncType>::type> operator<<(FuncType&& func) {
00047         return detail::ScopeExit<typename std::decay<FuncType>::type>(std::forward<FuncType>(func));
00048     }
00049 };
00050 
00051 } // end namespace detail
00052 
00053 } // end namespace basic
00054 } // end namespace lsf
00055 
00056 #define LSF_SCOPE_EXIT() auto LSF_TOKEN_CAT(scope_exit_, __LINE__) = lsf::basic::detail::ScopeExitCreator() << [&]
00057 #define LSF_SCOPE_EXIT_ARGS(args...) auto LSF_TOKEN_CAT(scope_exit_, __LINE__) = lsf::basic::detail::ScopeExitCreator() << [##args]
00058 #define LSF_SCOPE_EXIT_NAME(vname) auto vname = lsf::basic::detail::ScopeExitCreator() << [&]
00059
